content: meet the alpine scarf a fun men s scarf crochet pattern using brooding foresty colors and a detailed textured stitch this is a scarf the man in your life will be proud to wear over and over again it is made with worsted weight yarn making it perfect for a cold snowy day inside you will find instructions written in us crochet terms but you must already know the basics of crochet materials needed - worsted weight yarn in 2 colors i used lion brand heartland - i/5 5mm crochet hook - yarn needle finished measurements width 5 5 length - regular 60 - long 73 - extra long 87 sample shown is 73 you can also easily adjust both length and width to your liking skill level advanced beginner when you purchase this item you will receive an immediate download link for your pattern it is a pdf file terms of use this pattern is my original design it is for private use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any way if you have any questions please contact me and i will do my best to help to see more of my projects and free diy tutorials visit me on facebook and instagram www instagram com/desertblossomcrafts www facebook com/desertblossomcrafts/
